text: @realDonaldTrump It’s a shame the @SenateGOP didn’t do something about the criminal in the White House who was impeached for High Crimes and Misdemeanors. 125,000 Americans dead from the Coronavirus due to Trump’s negligence. 40 million Americans unemployed. Largest national debt. Highest poverty
